properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ho hirako tokoa, ry Ray,
Ilay fitia mahery;
Fa fitiavana mahay
Mamerina ny very.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O! hirao, hirao,
Ry foko hirao
Fa tena tia
Ilay Mpamonjinao

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hirao 'lay fahefana be
Manova ny mpanota,
Na dia malemy aza re,
Handresy izao ny ota.
O! hirao, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hirao 'lay fo mangoraka
Raha sendra anao tomany,
Manarina raha potraka
Noho ny onjan-tany.
O! hirao, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Hirao Ilay Mpiambina
Miahy sy mitandro,
'Lay tana-misakambina
Na alina na andro.
O! hirao, sns.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Hiraiko fa maharitra
Ny fitiavanao, Ray,
Mitaona ho any an-danitra,
Honina ao mandrakizay.
O! hirao, sns.
